## IsomorphicEncoder interface

Encoder that work for both server and client.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IsomorphicEncoder<EncodedRequest = unknown, EncodedResponse = unknown> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [decode(encoded)](./async-call-rpc.isomorphicencoder.decode.md) | Decode the request or response object. |
|  [encode(data)](./async-call-rpc.isomorphicencoder.encode.md) | Encode the request or response object. |
